name: BAD LIZZYS #2
description: BAD Lizzys have finally surfaced from the pixelated world. After drinking the portal juice their lines started to smooth out, and now they see clear. The future is bright, and these newly charged Lizzys are here to take over! Join the 10,000 BAD Lizzy adventure, staking, monetized tokens, charity and much more to come. Buckle up!
